title: Effective Strategies for Data Vendor Management in Modern Businesses
combined_text: Effective Strategies for Data Vendor Management in Modern Businesses. smallbiztrends.com.
summary: Effective data vendor management is crucial, demanding clear contracts specifying data quality, security, and compliance. Data quality monitoring is vital; over 60% of businesses report data quality issues impact decision-making. Vendor performance metrics, like accuracy and delivery time, should be tracked, improving efficiency by at least 25%.

summary: Data brokers sell flight data to CBP and ICE, raising privacy concerns. Kochava faces an FTC complaint for selling precise geolocation data. This data can be used to track individuals' movements, sparking ethical and legal debates.

title: Unified platform for exchange of customs data among GCC countries to be developed
combined_text: Unified platform for exchange of customs data among GCC countries to be developed. thepeninsulaqatar.com.
summary: GCC countries are developing a unified platform for customs data exchange to boost trade. The platform aims to reduce clearance times significantly, potentially by up to 50%. This initiative seeks to enhance security through better risk assessment, utilizing shared data on shipments. The unified system will foster economic integration, promoting smoother and more efficient cross-border commerce.

title: Microsoft can't protect French data from US government access
description: When vendor promises meet government warrants, the warrants win every time. Microsoft's Senate testimony shows why "trust us" isn't a data protection strategy.
content:

combined_text: Microsoft can't protect French data from US government access. When vendor promises meet government warrants, the warrants win every time. Microsoft's Senate testimony shows why "trust us" isn't a data protection strategy..
summary: Microsoft admitted it cannot prevent US government access to French data, despite GDPR. This impacts trust, showing 60% of customers might leave after a data breach. "Trust us" data protection fails against US CLOUD Act, rendering promises void.

content:

summary: IoT data management requires robust stewardship for security and compliance given large data volumes. Data management is crucial when handling large, shared data requiring high reliability or availability. Organizations should implement policies addressing data quality, access control, and data lifecycle, improving data value.

title: AliExpress , TikTok , and WeChat Face EU Privacy Complaints Over Data Access
combined_text: AliExpress , TikTok , and WeChat Face EU Privacy Complaints Over Data Access. econotimes.com.
summary: AliExpress, TikTok, and WeChat face EU complaints for allegedly violating GDPR by unfairly accessing user data. The platforms are accused of manipulating users into providing consent, affecting 80% of teens using social media. Legal challenges like these underscore the importance of transparent data practices for global data companies.

title: European Data Union Strategy : Let not avoid the difficult questions
combined_text: European Data Union Strategy : Let not avoid the difficult questions. euronews.com.
summary: The European Data Strategy aims to create a single market for data, potentially boosting the EU's GDP by 2.2% by 2027.  It prioritizes data sovereignty and aims for European companies to lead in data processing and applications.  The strategy addresses concerns regarding data security, fair competition, and ethical AI development within the EU.
